Token.Abstract: Objects wishing to act as the delegate for RKMapperOperation objects must adopt the RKMapperOperationDelegate protocol. The protocol provides a rich set of optional callback methods that provides insight into the lifecycle of a mapper operation.
Tells the delegate that the mapper operation is about to start mapping.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation that is about to start mapping.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapper has finished.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation that has finished mapping.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapper has been cancelled.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation that was cancelled.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapper has found one or more mappable object representations at a key path specified in the mappingsDictionary.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation performing the mapping.

Parameter.Name: dictionaryOrArrayOfDictionaries
Parameter.Abstract: The NSDictictionary or NSArray of NSDictionary object representations that was found at the keyPath.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path that the representation was read from in the representation. If the keyPath was [NSNull null] in the mappingsDictionary, it will be given as nil to the delegate.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapper failed to find any mappable object representations at a key path specified in the mappingsDictionary.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation performing the mapping.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path that was searched for a mappable object representation.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapper is about to start a mapping operation to map a representation found in the representation.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation performing the mapping.

Parameter.Name: mappingOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation that is about to be started.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path that was mapped. A nil key path indicates that the mapping matched the entire representation.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that a mapping operation that was started by the mapper has finished executing.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation performing the mapping.

Parameter.Name: mappingOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation that has finished.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path that was mapped. A nil key path indicates that the mapping matched the entire representation.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that a mapping operation that was started by the mapper has failed with an error.

Parameter.Name: mapper
Parameter.Abstract: The mapper operation performing the mapping.

Parameter.Name: mappingOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation that has failed.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path that was mapped. A nil key path indicates that the mapping matched the entire representation.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error that occurred during the execution of the mapping operation.
